casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Robert Dwayne LEWIS 140PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 12, 2019 Kathryn L. VandenBerg, Assistant Appellant Defender, for Lewis, Robert Dwayne. Milind Kumar Dongre, Attorney at Law, Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, Kristy M. Newton, District Attorney, Evelyn M. McCloud, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th of March 2019 by State of NC to Amend Appellee's Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th of March 2019."
